text: where is the best place to report form validation bugs?
yeah I went back and checked. I think it’s just a different issue. I tried it with a cdn2 link and below about 800 px wide on reload it modifies the HTML to not have a source.

ugh, HubSpot's css minification causing issues in IE.
the unit-type is being stripped out of the `flex` shorthand: `flex: 1 1 0px` becoming `flex: 1 1 0`. Least i know of a workaround but don't like having to directly declare `flex-basis: 0%` or set the `flex` shorthand to `flex: 1`.
anyone else ever get a similar issue?
it happens to me, and the problem was when we activate the vidyard video feature.
so, we fix using the original URL of the video on the HubSpot CDN
AND, we have problems with upper case in the URL on safari
you can use `{% raw %}` to avoid minification for that line I think (until they fix the issue)
give support a call or email and we’ll fix it.
